name: Alexandra Chen
persona: Alexandra Chen is a 21-year-old psychology major who is steadily working toward her degree, maintaining a CGPA of 2.93. She is moderately conscientious and motivated to achieve her academic goals, showing persistence even when faced with setbacks. While Alexandra sometimes struggles with test anxiety and self-discipline, she compensates with her determination and willingness to seek help when needed. Her perseverance and desire to improve keep her engaged in her studies and campus life.
